name: trash
description: Web-based card game using the EcmaserveGames Ecosystem

scripts.compile: npm run compile:proto && webpack && npm run tsc
scripts.compile:proto: rimraf lib/proto && mkdirp lib/proto && copyfiles -f src/proto/*.proto lib/proto && npm run compile:proto:commonjs && npm run compile:proto:types
scripts.compile:proto:commonjs: pbjs -t static-module -w commonjs -o src/proto/types.js src/proto/actions.proto src/proto/state.proto && copyfiles -f src/proto/types.js lib/proto
scripts.compile:proto:types: pbjs -t static-module src/proto/actions.proto src/proto/state.proto | pbts -o src/proto/types.d.ts -

author: Ryan Hafer <hafer.ryan@gmail.com>
